meetingText: Today we reviewed the timetable for the new project. All roles have been established and ideas will be shared at following meeting. Everyone will reconvene in person at 4pm.
All new team members received the team handbook, reviewed contents, set time aside for questions
We will move to the new office very soon. All team members must be packed an ready to go by next Monday.
Art Department will need to finalize all the details of the garden project by next week.
